commit.message:
PR c++/81204 - parse error with dependent template-name

	* parser.c (cp_parser_lookup_name): Disqualify function templates
	after lookup.

From-SVN: r249750

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2017-06-28  Jason Merrill  <jason@redhat.com>
+
+	PR c++/81204 - parse error with dependent template-name
+	* parser.c (cp_parser_lookup_name): Disqualify function templates
+	after lookup.
+
